data.Title: My City Data Learning Tool
data.Short-Message: Cisco DevNet's tool uses American Community Survey data from the U.S. Census Bureau to drive awareness of Census Bureau data for mobile millennials and application developers so they can solve social problems using open data available for their communities and cities.

data.Title: Myspot
data.Short-Message: Excella Consulting's tool uses data sets from the DC Department of Human Services to help youth experiencing homelessness find and access services in the Washington, DC area.

data.Title: PAIRIN Pathways
data.Short-Message: This tool uses data from the U.S. Census Bureau, Department of Labor, O*NET, and more to help veterans translate their developed skills into private sector careers and connect them to the education, soft skills development, and employers that can ensure their success.

data.Title: Grants Intelligence
data.Short-Message: eCivis's tool uses USA Spending, Single Audit, Census Bureau and Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance data to help local, state, federal, and tribal governments navigate federal grants and maximize the return on investment of federal grant dollars.

data.Title: Social Impact Reporting Platform
data.Short-Message: True Impact used federal data to enhance its Social Impact Reporting Platform, enabling users to automatically query the federal grants.gov database to find funding opportunities they may qualify for.

data.Title: Get Vets Help
data.Short-Message: Care Partners Plus's tool uses Census Bureau and HUD data to help veterans communicate needs to their care team in real time, identifying high-risk veterans for suicide, homelessness and substance use for improved follow-up, transparency, and accountability.

data.Title: BayesDB
data.Short-Message: MIT's tool is a web-based artificial intelligence tool that helps journalists, philanthropists, public servants, and policy advocates to search Census Bureau, FBI, and CDC public data on demographics, criminal justice, public health, and elections.

data.Title: PopCount
data.Short-Message: IBM's tool is an iOS application to support the logistical planning, coordination, execution, and data collection effort undertaken by Census Bureau employees conducting the homeless count.

data.Title: DATA2GO.NYC
data.Short-Message: Measure of America created a free mapping and data tool for visualizing Census Bureau, state, and city data that can help with decennial Census outreach in NYC communities by answering questions like 'What happens with Census data?' and 'Why does the Census matter to me?'

data.Title: Data2Go for Census Outreach
data.Short-Message: Measure of America used their data platform data2go.nyc to create a free mapping and data tool for visualizing Census Bureau, state, and city data that can help with decennial Census outreach in NYC communities by answering questions like 'What happens with Census data?' and 'Why does the Census matter to me?'

data.Title: FindHome
data.Short-Message: Helping low income families overcome the stress of finding affordable housing this tool combines transit access, walkability and school information into one unique feed of available properties.

data.Title: Housing Calculator
data.Short-Message: Uses HUD rental data to identify areas that present a high-opportunity for families to supplement their housing costs through renting excess rooms or units.

data.Title: Neighborhood Opportunity
data.Short-Message: Uses Fair Market Rent data from HUD, along with OpenStreetMap, to rapidly and easily assess neighborhood family amenities and voucher amounts for Section 8 Housing Seekers.

data.Title: Opportunity Dashboard
data.Short-Message: Great Schools and Education Cities' uses college readiness data to measure gaps in access to educational opportunities across student groups to help advocates increase equity.

data.Title: Training Finder
data.Short-Message: Uses data from eligible training provider lists (ETPL) to surface education options that lead to in-demand careers for job seekers.

data.Title: School ResourceMapper
data.Short-Message: Brings together economic, health center, and community institution data to help school leaders find and develop community partnerships.

data.Title: LiveStories
data.Short-Message: Customizable data briefs use school-level data to help local school districts and education foundations inform parents and the electorate about the need for more funding.

data.Title: mySidewalk
data.Short-Message: Uses a combination of 30 datasets to generate instant insights that address accessibility of opportunity and emotional well-being for citizens across the county.

data.Title: Create
data.Short-Message: Uses traffic accident and fatality data to provide dynamic location-based visualizations of hazardous traffic corridors for citizens and community decision makers.

data.Title: Commuter Map
data.Short-Message: Uses commuting data from the LEHD Origin-Destination Employment Statistics, bus & rail transit routes to show commuter flows and gaps in access to transit.

data.Title: Findyour.town
data.Short-Message: Uses live spatial and development funding data from USDA, Census, DOT, and HUD to simplify funding eligibility with virtual story telling of our rural American communities.

data.Title: Fitbit
data.Short-Message: Lets users see how average activity relates to common health issues in each state, combining CDC health data with aggregated and anonymous Fitbit activity data from over 10 million users.

data.Title: EARS
data.Short-Message: Enables researchers to unobtrusively measure everyday behavior and integrate open data on local hazards & resources to build a risk state detection algorithm that powers precise, life-saving mental health interventions.

data.Title: TextHelp
data.Short-Message: Uses anonymized mental health data from the VA Health System to assess suicide and other risk in patients and guide them through crisis to available support resources.

data.Title: Opportunity. hackernest.com
data.Short-Message: Uses labor/employment info from multiple federal data sources to help navigate careers in government for Americans.

data.Title: Opportunity Enabler
data.Short-Message: Uses nationwide opportunity indexes to make search for opportunity more easily obtainable.

data.Title: Data.world Workspace
data.Category: housing health transportation employment education rural
data.Short-Message: Uses data from eleven federal agencies and twelve cities to facilitate finding, viewing and collaborating over data for Opportunity Project sprint participants.

data.Title: Wolfram Data Repository
data.Category: housing health transportation employment education rural
data.Short-Message: Uses datasets from multiple agencies to help researchers and developers rapidly prototype and deploy tools that address a variety of problems surrounding access to opportunity.

data.Title: CareerSpark
data.Short-Message: A mobile application that uses employment statistics and occupational data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics to make career exploration easy and accessible for high school students.

data.Title: Opportunity Score
data.Short-Message: This tool from Redfin shows jobs you can get to in 30 minutes, without a car, from any address.

data.Title: GreatSchools
data.Short-Message: A collaboration with Zillow to help families find housing near high opportunity schools.

data.Title: PolicyMap Tool
data.Short-Message: A tool that allows users to identify areas of opportunity by specifying their most important priorities.

data.Title: Transit Analyst
data.Short-Message: An interactive tool from Azavea for exploring transit accessibility to target resources from focus areas.

data.Title: diversitydatakids.org
data.Short-Message: Story maps providing visibility into the affordability of opportunity for children in U.S. metro areas.

data.Title: Baltimore Explorer
data.Short-Message: A tool by Zillow for exploring the opportunity and growth potential of Baltimore's neighborhoods.

data.Title: Community Commons
data.Short-Message: A new tool for finding areas of opportunity through geographic visualizations and reports.

data.Title: Streetwyze
data.Short-Message: A "ground-truthing" neighborhood navigator powered by local knowledge.

data.Title: Visualizing Youth Disconnection
data.Short-Message: This tool from Measure of America combines various data critical to the well being of New Yorkers.

data.Title: National Equity Atlas
data.Short-Message: A PolicyLink tool to allow comparison of disaggregated demographic indicators.

data.Title: OpenData Network
data.Category: housing health transportation employment education rural
data.Short-Message: A tool from Socrata that allows for comparison and similarity detection of geographic regions.

data.Title: Affordable Housing Finder
data.Category: housing health transportation employment education rural
data.Short-Message: A tool from Esri that shows where opportunities are for low income citizens with children.

data.Title: Job Crowdsourcing Tool
data.Short-Message: Ushahidi Job Postings combines crowdsourced job reports to share alerts of local job openings.
